name: BD Computers LTD
description: Use can make an order and also delete the order.
An admin can manage all order, and also delete order that is not paid.
The website is fully responsive for mobile and desktop.
There is a dashboard that gives access to different routes between user and admin.
technology: React.js, React Router, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Rest API, Firebase,React hook form, React query, Stripe, Express.js, Jwt, Mongo DB, Heroku, React icons.

name: Laptop Stockroom
description: User can add and update existing product quantities and delete them.
technology: React.js, React Router, Axios, React Modal, React Helmet Async, Mongo Db, Tailwind CSS, Heroku, Firebase.

name: Just Justice
description: It is an individual service provider web app.
This website is fully responsive for mobile and desktop.
technology: React.js, React Router, React Bootstrap, Firebase, React Toastify, Fontawesome.
